title.rendered: Mandatory notification of trade in Aqualis ASA

content.rendered:
On April 14 2015, Gross Management, a company owned 50% (indirectly) by board member Øystein Stray Spetalen and 50% (indirectly) by board member Glen Ole Rødland, primary insider insider pursuant to STA §§ 4-2 (1) third sentence. cf. § 3-6 (3), acquired 114 675 shares at an average purchase price of NOK 7.5,- per share,
After the transaction Gross Management AS and associated companies hold 3 045 953 shares in Aqualis ASA corresponding to 7.05 % of the outstanding shares.

excerpt.rendered: On April 14 2015, Gross Management, a company owned 50% (indirectly) by board member Øystein Stray Spetalen and 50% (indirectly) by board member Glen Ole Rødland, […]

jetpack-related-posts.title: Mandatory notification of trade in Aqualis ASA
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Wed, April 30 2015 Ferncliff DAI Listed AS, a company controlled by board member Øystein Stray Spetalen, purchased 327,023 shares at NOK 8.94, - per share. After the transactions Øystein Stray Spetalen and Associated companies hold 6,212,709 shares in Aqualis ASA Corresponding Thurs 04.14% of the outstanding shares.
